help.!film/!movie/!f <film-name> (<year>): Searches a film on Letterboxd. The year is optional.
help.!user/!u <username>: Displays the details of a Letterboxd member.
help.!review/!r <username> <film-name> (<year: Displays the logged entries (review, diary) from a member.
help.!list/!l <username> <list-name>: Searches a list by the specified member.
help.!diary <username>: Displays the recent diary entries from the specified member.
help.!del: Deletes the last message the bot sent in a channel.
